name: Yarona FM
description: Yarona FM is a Botswana FM radio based in Gaborone with a core broadcast audience of youth (age 14), with a spill out to ages 35. The network plays a relatively freeform mix of indie music, including rock, pop, alternative hip hop, motswako and electronic music.

name: JazzySoul Radio Nata
description: Welcome to JazzySoul Radio .Nata with Dj JazzyPete .We are on a mission to get great African and Botswana music Vibes , Neosoul , Soul , R&B, Jazz broadcasted to the world . Programs by international Dj / Dj JazzyPete Broadcasting from the Amazing Nata Botswana , Africa

name: The Cross FM
description: The Cross FM (TSN) is a faith based network dedicated to spreading the Gospel 24 hours a day, seven days a week â€“ all around the globe, broadcasting worship of all genres, all denominations uniting people from all walks of life through inspiring music and key driven content, featuring programming that entertains and teaches biblical values and ministry from the world's most influential pastors and Christian leaders.
